item.title: Preparation of GCP certificated associate cloud engineer [WIP]
item.description: Useful Links About ACE Certification Exam Overview Official Exam Guide Google Cloud Training Online Courses Name Platform Price Mock Exam Cloud Engineering with Google Cloud Professional Certificate Coursera $50/month N Recommended Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer LinuxAcademy $50 Y (50Q) Ultimate Google Certified Associate Cloud Engineer 2020 GCP @Udemy ~$60 Y (70Q) Mostly on sale (<$15) Google Certified Associate Cloud Engineer Certification A Cloud Guru @Udemy ~$230 Y (100Q) Mostly on sale (<$20) Hand-on Labs@Qwiklabs Qwiklabs Charged by credit N Free credits are available from time to time Practice Exams Platform Price # of Questions Official Practice Exam Free 25 Too easy but make sure to run through this Whizlabs $20 150 BrainCert $30 250 People Joseph Holbrook (The Cloud Tech Guy): medium, YouTube, Udemy Repos sathishvj/awesome-gcp-certifications ddneves/awesome-gcp-certifications (outdated) Cheatsheets Whizlabs Viniciuscoding/granja_Google_Associate_Cloud_Engineer WebLeash/gcp_associate_engineer TiagoGouvea/google-cloud-associate-cloud-engineer-preparation DRpandaMD/gcp-certified-associate-cloud-engineer-2020 Shekhar Sarker: Notes from my Google Cloud Certification Exam Charles.
